synonyms: antaḥ-pura—the internal abode; goloka-śrī-vṛndāvana—Goloka Vṛndāvana; yāhāṅ—where; nitya-sthiti—eternal residence; mātā-pitā—mother and father; bandhu-gaṇa—and friends.
translation: "The internal abode is called Goloka Vṛndāvana. It is there that Lord Kṛṣṇa's personal friends, associates, father and mother live.
